attributes.action: Pay the full pension of soldiers who have been made redundant
attributes.additional_details: Soldiers serve this country risk their lives daily and should be rewarded fairly for their work, not conned out of their pensions by malicious redundancies. http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/soldier-sacked-army-72-hours-1389909#ICID=sharebar_facebook
attributes.background: We request government to pay all soldiers fair pensions and at least within a year of any redundancy they should receive their full pension they would of had if not made redundant. if a soldier is fit to serve and is near end of his service he should be allowed to complete that service.
